casebody.data:
CITY OF STAMFORD
v.
Tom PEPAJ et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 23, 2018

The petition by the defendants Tom Pepaj and Martha Pepaj for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn.App. 903, 181 A.3d 151 (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C. J., and McDONALD, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
